sentences.en: A coat of paint will freshen this room up.
sentences.cn: 刷一层油漆会使房间焕然一新.

sentences.en: A thorough brushing helps to freshen up your mouth.
sentences.cn: 彻底刷牙有助于口气清新。
我再给你添些酒好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you mind if I freshen up before I go?
sentences.cn: 你介意我走之前梳洗打扮一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: Go and freshen yourself up before the guests arrive.
sentences.cn: 趁容人没到,你去梳洗一下.

sentences.en: he went off to freshen up in the local baths.
sentences.cn: 他去当地的澡堂洗澡，以振作精神。

sentences.en: I took a shower to freshen up.
sentences.cn: 我淋浴以振作一下精神.

sentences.en: I will freshen your drink with more soda and ice cubes.
sentences.cn: 我给你的饮料重加一些苏打水和冰块.

sentences.en: I'll just freshen ( myself ) up before dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚饭前我要去 梳洗 打扮一番.

sentences.en: My room needed a lick of paint to freshen it up.
sentences.cn: 我的房间只要刷一点油漆就能焕然一新。

sentences.en: The rain had freshened the air.
sentences.cn: 下雨使空气变得清新了。

sentences.en: They returned to their hotel to freshen up.
sentences.cn: 他们回旅馆梳洗了一下.

sentences.en: They went back to the hotel to freshen themselves up.
sentences.cn: 他们回到旅馆去梳洗打扮一番.

sentences.en: Using a mouthwash freshens the breath.
sentences.cn: 使用漱口液可以使口气清新。

sentences.en: We freshen up before going to the party.
sentences.cn: 参加聚会之前清醒一下.

sentences.en: We'll stay here until you freshen up your memories!
sentences.cn: 我们会呆在这儿知道你们记起来为止!

sentences.en: Your highball is almost gone. May I freshen your drink?
sentences.cn: 你的威士忌快喝光了, 我再给你一杯好 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 新鲜的；清新的；淡水的；无经验的
新鲜人；大学一年级新生
使清新；使新鲜；使精神焕发

phrases.tran_cn: （洗过澡或换过干净衣服后）使自己恢复精力；使自己精神饱满

trans.tran_en: to make something look or feel clean, new, attractive, cool etc

trans.tran_cn: 使恢复精力，增强，淡化，（产后）开始泌乳
使新鲜，使清爽，使有精神，把（自己）盥洗一番，（使）洁净，使掺酌于，加浓（饮料）
